nodes.text: The Frontier Vacation Package was a package holiday advertised and sold by the Star Tours travel agency by the year 4.3 ABY to a family resort on the planet Bar Neth. Activities included visiting the Carl Hodgesville Dude Ranch, playing on golf on zero-gravity courses, camping, and safaris.
The Frontier Vacation Package was first mentioned in Tokyo Disneyland's simulator ride theme park attraction Star Tours, which opened on July 12, 1989.
